title: fps drops 7.24
body: i had like 400 fps constant every game before this patch came out, now im playing with 60 fps droping to 30 and even less, it actually sucks you cant play the game like this. is there coming a patch for it?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Heya, this could be caused by a few different factors!  I'm curious if you might have some bad game files or PC stress not rendering the game well since patching, specifically Snowdown content.  What happens if you go to your in-game settings and disable Snowdown assets?
Moving the mouse causes lag in my game.

This could be a configuration problem not receiving your input properly.  A config reset might help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
Huge FPS issues here since 7.24b also, Caused eye strain from it flickering so much!
